GEORGE CHEN.summary: Chen serves as mayor of the Torrance City Council. Mayor George Chen serves as the presiding officer of the Torrance City Council, bringing leadership and vision to city governance. Demonstrates strong consensus-building skills, voting unanimously in favor of all 14 recorded motions. Primary policy focus areas include Planning & Development, reflecting commitment to these key municipal priorities. Key initiatives include City budget oversight, Public safety initiatives, demonstrating proactive leadership in city governance. Learn more about Chen's background and priorities at the [official bio page](https://www.torranceca.gov/government/city-council-and-elected-officials/chen).

MIKE GERSON.summary: Gerson serves as councilmember of the Torrance City Council. Councilmember Mike Gerson brings extensive community experience and dedication to serving Torrance residents. Demonstrates strong consensus-building skills, voting unanimously in favor of all 14 recorded motions. Primary policy focus areas include Planning & Development, reflecting commitment to these key municipal priorities. Key initiatives include Community engagement programs, Development oversight, demonstrating proactive leadership in city governance. Learn more about Gerson's background and priorities at the [official bio page](https://www.torranceca.gov/government/city-council-and-elected-officials/gerson).

JON KAJI.summary: Kaji serves as councilmember of the Torrance City Council. Councilmember Jon Kaji is committed to responsible development and maintaining Torrance's quality of life. Key initiatives include Sustainable development, Environmental protection, demonstrating proactive leadership in city governance. BRIDGET LEWIS.summary: Lewis serves as councilmember of the Torrance City Council. Councilmember Bridget Lewis is a dedicated public servant focused on community well-being and constituent service. Demonstrates strong consensus-building skills and active participation in city governance. Primary policy focus areas include Community Services, Public Safety, and Budget & Finance. Key initiatives include Community service programs, Public safety initiatives, and Budget oversight. Councilmember Aurelio Mattucci is dedicated to maintaining Torrance's character while supporting responsible growth and development. Demonstrates commitment to community engagement and fiscal responsibility. Primary policy focus areas include Planning & Development, Public Safety, and Budget & Finance. Key initiatives include Development oversight, Public safety initiatives, and Budget management.
